name: Multimaker
description: Corporation "Omega" has developed a special test for the distribution of people by category. Can you pass the test and secure a bright future?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
